remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的对象及其关联的对象确定日期、时间、数字、货币值的默认格式、文本的排序顺序、大小写约定和字符串比较。The object that is returned by this property and its associated objects determine the default format for dates, times, numbers, currency values, the sorting order of text, casing conventions, and string comparisons. 当前区域性为正在执行的线程的属性。The current culture is a property of the executing thread. 检索属性的值 与检索属性返回的对象的性能更高 `Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture` 。Retrieving the value of the property is a more performant equivalent of retrieving the object returned by the `Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture` property. > [!NOTE] > 在 .NET Framework 4.5.2 及更早版本中， 属性是只读的; 也就是说，您可以检索属性值，但不能对其进行设置。In the .NET Framework 4.5.2 and earlier versions, the property is read-only; that is, you can retrieve the property value, but you cannot set it. 若要更改当前区域性，请将 表示新区域性的对象分配给 `Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture` 属性。To change the current culture, you assign the object that represents the new culture to the `Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture` property. 从开始 [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)] ， 属性为读写属性; 您可以设置和检索属性的值。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], the property is read-write; you can both set and retrieve the property's value. 如果将属性值设置为 表示新区域性的对象，则该属性的值 `Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture` 也会发生更改。If you do set the property value to a object that represents a new culture, the value of the `Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture` property also changes. 本节内容：In this section: [如何确定线程的区域性](#ThreadCulture) [How a Thread's Culture Is Determined](#ThreadCulture) [获取当前区域性](#Getting) [Getting the Current Culture](#Getting) [显式设置 CurrentCulture 属性](#ExplicitSetting) [Explicitly Setting the CurrentCulture Property](#ExplicitSetting) [当前区域性和用户重写](#Overrides) [The Current Culture and User Overrides](#Overrides) [区域性和 Windows 应用Culture and Windows Apps](#WindowsAndCurr) ## 如何确定线程的区域性How a Thread's Culture Is Determined 启动线程时，其区域性最初确定如下：When a thread is started, its culture is initially determined as follows: - 通过在 执行线程的应用程序域中检索属性指定的区域性，如果属性值不为 `null` 。By retrieving the culture that is specified by the property in the application domain in which the thread is executing, if the property value is not `null`. - 如果该线程是一个线程池线程，该线程正在执行基于任务的异步操作，并且应用面向的是 [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)] 或更高版本的 .NET Framework，则其区域性由调用线程的区域性确定。If the thread is a thread pool thread that is executing a task-based asynchronous operation and the app targets the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)] or a later version of the .NET Framework, its culture is determined by the culture of the calling thread. 下面的示例将当前区域性更改为葡萄牙 (巴西) 并启动六个任务，每个任务显示其线程 ID、任务 ID 及其当前区域性。The following example changes the current culture to Portuguese (Brazil) and launches six tasks, each of which displays its thread ID, its task ID, and its current culture. 每个任务 (和) 的线程继承了调用线程的区域性。Each of the tasks (and the threads) has inherited the culture of the calling thread.
